class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Psychology majors only. Credit is variable, 1.00 - 12.00 (For 3.00 hrs/week = 1.00 credit). Students must have consent of faculty member and agreement on a topic. Students are required to complete a PSYC 498R/499R Contract with regular faculty member detailing their research. Contracts are available in the departmental office. A list of regular faculty members of the Psychology Department who are eligible to supervise may be found on the back of the contract form or on our website at: http://psychology.emory.edu/home/people/faculty/index.html. Only faculty members whose names are on this list may supervise 499 works. Contracts are available through Lorenza Houser (lhouser@emory.edu). It must be completed and returned to Ms. Houser prior to enrollment.
course_description: Credit variable. Psychology majors only, registration by permission of faculty supervisor.
